Text: Shrugging off a wider gloom, London-listed shares of tour operator TUI rallied another 6.5% after it stuck to its earnings forecast for the year, a day after the collapse of its rival Thomas Cook.
Cause: the collapse of its rival Thomas Cook.
Effect: Shrugging off a wider gloom, London-listed shares of tour operator TUI rallied another 6.5% after it stuck to its earnings forecast for the year
Sentence: <e2>Shrugging off a wider gloom, London-listed shares of tour operator TUI rallied another 6.5% after it stuck to its earnings forecast for the year</e2>, a day after <e1>the collapse of its rival Thomas Cook.</e1>
